headline: U.S. Power-Plant Pollution Rose Sharply in 2025
summary: The increase was a rare uptick in an otherwise long-term downward trend, partly because of more coal being burned to generate electricity.

headline: Smucker Shares Jump 12% After Elliott Secures Board Seats

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider NRG Energy (NRG) After Its 64% One Year Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether NRG Energy’s recent run still leaves any value on the table, you are not alone. This article will walk through what the current share price might be implying. The stock most recently closed at US$183.59, with returns of 7.3% over the last week, 22.5% over the last month, 10.5% year to date and 64.0% over the past year, while the 3 year return is described as very large and the 5 year return is also very large. This performance sits alongside ongoing coverage of...

headline: JM Smucker adds to board after deal with activist investor
summary: Elliott Investment Management, which has recently been in dialogue with PepsiCo, has also invested in JM Smucker.

headline: The J.M. Smucker Co. Appoints Two New Independent Directors
summary: The J.M. Smucker Co. today announced it has appointed Woo-Sung (Bruce) Chung and David Singer to its Board of Directors, effective April 15, 2026. With the addition of Chung and Singer, the Board will comprise 11 directors, 10 of whom are independent, and all of whom are focused on advancing the work underway to drive continued growth, enhanced profitability, and disciplined capital allocation for the Company.

headline: JM Smucker adds 2 board members in deal with activist investor
summary: Elliott Investment Management said the agreement comes after “constructive engagement” with the Uncrustables maker, which has faced higher coffee prices and challenges with its Hostess acquisition.
